availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, James F. Robinson: Appointments by the Governor, Civil Appointments, 1862-1863

body.p: Personally appeared before me the Subscriber a Notary Public in and for said County Thomas D. Snyder a resident of this city of Cincinnati and makes solemn oath that he will well and truly execute perform and fulfill all the duties obligations and requirements of the Office of Commissioner of Deeds for the State of Kentucky in the State of Ohio according to the best of his ability.
Sworn and subscribed to this thirtieth day of December Eighteen hundred sity two

Samuel A Sargent
Notary Public
Hamilton County Ohio
NOTORIAL SEAL
HAMILTON COUNTY, OHIO.
